certifications.title: C|CT Certified Cybersecurity Technician
certifications.description: Industry-recognized entry-level cybersecurity certification from EC-Council, creators of CEH. Validated hands-on skills across network defense, ethical hacking, digital forensics, and security operations through 85+ practical labs on live cyber ranges. Covers incident response, threat intelligence, cryptography, and risk management aligned with NIST NICE Framework.

certifications.title: Metasploit Penetration Testing
certifications.description: Specialized certification in offensive security using the Metasploit Framework. Mastered vulnerability assessment workflows, exploit development, payload generation, and post-exploitation techniques. Hands-on experience with msfconsole, auxiliary modules, and automated attack automation for enterprise penetration testing scenarios.

certifications.title: Wireshark Network Troubleshooting
certifications.description: Advanced network analysis certification focused on TCP/IP troubleshooting and packet-level forensics using Wireshark. Developed expertise in deep packet capture (PCAP) inspection, protocol layer analysis, custom display filters, and identifying network performance issues. Skills applicable to security monitoring, incident investigation, and network optimization.

certifications.title: Environmental Sustainability & Digital Technologies
certifications.description: Digital badge from Italy's top technical university covering the intersection of sustainability and technology. Explored UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), ESG frameworks, green IT practices, and the role of digital innovation in environmental protection. Includes systems thinking approaches to corporate sustainability and circular economy principles.

certifications.title: Blockchain Fundamentals
certifications.description: Comprehensive course on distributed ledger technologies covering blockchain architecture, consensus mechanisms (PoW, PoS), cryptocurrency fundamentals, and smart contract development. Explored practical applications including DeFi, NFTs, and enterprise blockchain solutions with focus on security considerations and scalability challenges.

certifications.title: Social Media Marketing
certifications.description: Professional certification in digital marketing strategies across major social platforms. Covered content strategy development, audience targeting, analytics interpretation, paid advertising campaigns, and ROI measurement. Practical skills in brand building, community engagement, and data-driven marketing optimization.

certifications.title: English Language B1 Certification
certifications.description: CEFR B1 (Intermediate) English language certification validating professional communication competencies. Demonstrated proficiency in technical documentation comprehension, academic writing, professional correspondence, and verbal communication for international academic and business environments.

certifications.title: Agile Project Management
certifications.description: Digital badge from Politecnico di Milano's School of Management on Agile methodologies. Covered Scrum framework fundamentals including sprint planning, backlog management, daily standups, and retrospectives. Explored hybrid approaches integrating traditional project management with Agile practices, servant leadership principles, and team accountability dynamics.
